properties.Name: PartyBusinessMetric
properties.Description: The associated Business Metric reported by the Party for the indicated period.

Columns.Name: PartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: BusinessMetricId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a business metric.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the associated metric is calculated.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the associated metric is calculated.

Columns.Name: PartyBusinessMetricTargetValue
Columns.Description: The target value of the party business metric for the indicated period.

Columns.Name: PartyBusinessMetricValue
Columns.Description: The value of the business metric calculated for the indicated period.

Columns.Name: PartyBusinessMetricNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the party business metric.

Columns.Name: KeyPerformanceIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates whether the metric is considered to be a key performance indicator during the given timeframe.
